title: Is Apollo Institute of Medical Science and Research a good institute for pursuing MBBS? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: I am not knowing well about AIMSR,but Government institutions are doing well in academics,Theory not going to make u good,it depends on how much exposure one get during 5 years of study,private institutions has no patient inflow but government institutions has lot.so in my thought government institutions students has more clinical knowledge over private and even there is no cadaver in some private colleges so how u will got basic anatomical background which u can apply in your clinical studies.So try for govt insn.
